error.message: Call to deprecated method getUrlGenerator() of class Drupal\Core\Form\FormBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the url_generator service instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to academic_applications.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
